welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wenzhou, China! Home to stunning mountains, beautiful coastlines, and a rich cultural heritage, Wenzhou is known for its vibrant markets, historic sites, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Al Arabia Restaurant
restaurants.description: Al Arabia Restaurant is a middle eastern restaurant located in the city.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
